00020 #define DEFAULT_TICKS_PER_SECOND 1000.0
00021 #define DEFAULT_SAMPLE_RATE     44100.0
00022 
00023 #define JCOM_EVENT_PRIORITY_HIGH 1              // HIGH communicates events in the Jamoma Clock thread
00024 #define JCOM_EVENT_PRIORITY_MEDIUM 2    // MEDIUM communicates events using Max's scheduler
00025 #define JCOM_EVENT_PRIORITY_LOW 3               // LOW communicates events using Max's low-priority queue
00026 
00027 
00028 typedef struct _jamoma_event{
00029         t_object                        *owner;                         // owning jamoma_scheduler object
00030         t_object                        *client;
00031         method                          callback;
00032         double                          delaytime;
00033         double                          targettime;
00034         long                            repeating;
00035         long                            priority;
00036         void                            *transfer_mechanism;
00037         _jamoma_event           *next;
00038         _jamoma_event           *prev;
00039 } t_jamoma_event;
00040 
00041 
00042 typedef struct _jamoma_scheduler{
00043         t_object                        obj;
00044         t_jamoma_event          *event_head;
00045         t_jamoma_event          *event_tail;
00046         double                          current_time;   // cached from the jamoma clock
00047         // TODO: some sort of accessor that would set tick period by saying 1000 ticks per second or something
00048 } t_jamoma_scheduler;
00049

00054 void                    jamoma_scheduler_getphase(double period, double* phase, double* slope);
00055 void                    jamoma_scheduler_rewind(t_jamoma_scheduler *x);

00057 void                    jamoma_scheduler_removeevent(t_jamoma_scheduler *x, t_object *event);
00058 void                    jamoma_scheduler_moveevent(t_jamoma_scheduler *x, t_jamoma_event *event, double newtime);
00059 void                    jamoma_scheduler_update(t_jamoma_scheduler *x, double *newTime);
00060 void                    jamoma_scheduler_doevents(t_jamoma_scheduler *x);

00065 void                    jamoma_event_dosend(t_jamoma_event *event);
